ref: 8962 *prāvurati ʻ covers ʼ. 2. Pp. prāˊvr̥ta -- RV. 3. prāvár- aṇa -- n. ʻ cloak ʼ ŚBr. [Cf. prāˊvr̥ṇōti ʻ covers ʼ ŚBr., Pk. pāuṇaï. -- √vr̥1]
Pa. pāpurati ʻ covers, veils ʼ ( -- p -- hyper -- paliism for -- v -- ), metath. pārupati (or < *pāruvati with earlier metath. of *pāvurati), pāpuraṇa -- , pārupaṇa -- n. ʻ clothing ʼ;
Si. porovanavā, porav˚, perav˚ ʻ to put on clothes ʼ, poravanaya, poron˚ ʻ robe, vesture ʼ;

lang: or mald. Maldivian dialect of Sinhalese
ref: Md. foruvān ʻ to clothe, bedeck ʼ.
